name: The Hero's Elegy
description:
The Hero's Elegy Controls:

Tap or click to move your character. Trying to move through an enemy mob will attack it. Move onto doors or stairways to go to the next room.

Description:

The Hero's Elegy is a dungeon-crawling, action-rpg game with rogue-lite elements. It has turn-based combat, but all characters run simultaneously, so you get all the speed and energy of real-time combat with none of the waiting of turn-based games!

In Rogue-mode, fight your way to the bottom of the procedurally-generated dungeon to find the treasure! Encounter new enemies, items, puzzles, and traps with every fresh play through!

The Hero's Elegy will eventually release as a free mobile app with DLC expansions to support new features! Mobile/Touch Input is a priority, so interacting through touch will be fluid and intuitive!

It's still early in development, so expect many updates and new content regularly!
The Hero's Elegy is exclusively a Rogue-mode dungeon-crawler right now. This is more of a Demo of the intended final game, enabling quick iteration of systems and features!

I look forward to any feedback users may have, so please leave a comment!
